example.eg: Our lightweight jackets are perfect for travel.
The lightweight match will start at 8 pm.
It's just a lightweight romance novel, but I enjoyed reading it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 轻松的, 无足轻重的

example.eg: The new lightweight looks like serious competition for the champion.

dsense.name: lightweight, light-weight, light weight
dsense.guideword: informal, figurative (person who gets drunk quickly) (人)

example.eg: Stumbling after only two beers? You're such a lightweight!
Don't be concerned about his outburst: he's a lightweight.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 无足轻重的人, 无关紧要的人
